script.name: judy
script.line: Fear. Treachery. Bloodlust! Thousands of years ago, these were the forces that ruled our world. A world where prey were scared of predators. And predators had an uncontrollable biological urge to maim and maul and...

script.name: judy
script.line: Back then, the world was divided in two. Vicious predator or Meek prey.

script.name: judy
script.line: But over time, we evolved, and moved beyond our primitive savage ways.

script.name: judy
script.line: Now, predator and prey live in harmony.

script.name: judy
script.line: And every young mammal has multitudinous opportunities.

script.name: ASTRONAUT SHEEP
script.line: Yeah, I don’t have to cower in a herd anymore.

script.name: ASTRONAUT SHEEP
script.line: Instead I can be an astronaut.

script.name: ACTUARY JAGUAR
script.line: I don’t have to be a lonely hunter any more.

script.name: ACTUARY JAGUAR
script.line: Today I can hunt for tax exemptions. I’m gonna be an actuary!

script.name: judy
script.line: And I can make the world a better place! I am going to be...
